SELECT MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID,
MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID,
MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.NAME,
MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.DATA_NO, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.USER_KEY, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.TS,
MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU.NAME AS HIYOU_KAMOKU_NAME
FROM MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU
JOIN MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU ON MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID = MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID
WHERE MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU( MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID ,
MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID ,
NAME ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID') ,
:MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID ,
:NAME ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU SET MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID ,
NAME = :NAME ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID = :MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID AND TS = :TS
